name: Pel
appearance: Ink-thin elder with a prism monocle, hair like silver threads, fingertips permanently gray with pumice dust.
character: Playfully didactic, with a zealot’s conviction that light reveals truth but a showman’s love for spectacle.
talents: hears when glass is about to crack
can split a flame’s color by hand-held prisms
flaws: dismisses the ethics of surveillance as ‘later work’
dreams: secure exclusive rights to sky-signals for the Collegium
craft a lens that reads intent from mouth-light
turn Avarinth itself into a speaking lens
secrets: Keeps a shard of the rumored Mother Lens hidden beneath the Conservatory
Accepted Compact coin to exaggerate certain Parliament lamp colors
A living pane in his care whispers his name in other voices
